brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a client communicating with a host.

The client uses the EIA/T I A - 232 protocol to connect to a modem. The modem connects to a POTS cloud. The POTS cloud connects to a second modem, which connected to the host, also using the EIA/T I A -232 protocol.
The signals sent between the computer (client/host) and the modem are digital signal. The signals sent between the modem and the telephone network (POTS) are analog signals.
